Whether your toddler is doing the Shimmy or simply coolin`with friends by the sandbox, this will have your baby trotting like a Fox.  This gorgeous Flapper Bonnet features cute little Ear Flaps and ties.

name: Cotton Pirate Night Owl ear Flap Hat - Stripes in espresso and cream. With blue and black ties
description:
Attention Owlet and Owlettes the latest craze has arrived !! for years we’ve had Hollywood Stars and the world buzzing about our now famous mini-monkeys, it’s time to move over monkeys and bring in the Owl !

Our brand new all Original Owl Hats fuse together colorful Cotton yarn & fabric and are seriously irresistible! Whether your little one is a snow owl a wise owl, or a night owl, you will not believe how stylish and soft these are.

This particular Night Owl is a stripe pattern in Oatmeal and Espresso. This pirate hat has one eye that is Black,Charcoal, Mustard, and Silver. While his other eye is covered in a black eye patch and navy stitching.
It has the cutest little beak in orange. The multi colored peaks and funky blue and black fabric ties incorporate all the colours of the hat. 
Currently available in many different color combos, however if they don’t make you hoot in excitement, we always welcome custom requests. 
A true original we guarantee you will not find these anywhere else!

name: The Dancing Starlit cotton dress Citefuzz
description:
This delightful little dress is the perfect autum color scheme.Its pattern mimics the look of cross-stitches. 
It's funky and girly at the same time.
Mustard,cinnamon, turmeric and soft pastel pink to name a few. The sleeves are made out of a %100 cotton jersey in red and white stripes. 

The Dress fabric is 100% cotton.

All seams are professionally finished.

The dress has a ton of room and can be worn for many years as as shirt or with leggings.

Please note that different sizes will have repeats of the same size.
Size shown is 12m.

Available from sizes 6m to 12 years. 

Fabric is limited so get this while it lasts.
Thank you for looking and check back for new citefuzz goodies often.

These sets are made to order Please allow up to 2 weeks for you custom items to be made.

This set would be perfect for a non traditional holiday outfit.

Inspired by the ever popular Retro Chevron Stripe!
Made with %100 cotton our Rikrac hat sports a large brim that can be worn on the front, side or back of the head to allow for many trendy looks.It has just the right amount slouch at the top of the hat.
It  features the delectable combination of Purple,Blue,Green,Yellow, Orange, Yellow and Cream. It also comes with the cutest double layer flower clip in Cream(not Shown) which is fully removable and can be worn alone as a hair barrette.
This cotton beanie would be perfect for the trendy  boys or fashionable girls and is completely unisex, which makes for the perfect gift or Photography prop.
Citefuzz Cotton hats are guaranteed to impress !Whether your going for a stroll, chilling at a Cafe or out for a night on the town our hats will compliment and complete almost every outfit in your closet.

name: Deluxe Cotton Patchwork Reversible Quilted Minky Bib
description:
These bibs are a Citefuzz classic and they have made a comeback!
This is no ordinary bib, this is an Accessory! 

As a mother I was inspired to come up with an ultra funky bib that would really soak up drool and at the same time feel like part of my daughter’s outfit.
I did not want to look at yucky stains or a tired old teddy bear, so I came up with these soul inspired classic designs… 

They are made with %100 designer cotton fabrics and backed with super soft minky. Sandwiched in between is a layer of absorbent organic cotton batting and are all ready to ship!

This bib will add pizzazz to any outfit! And if you don’t like the colors simply flip it over to the soft minky, your baby will love the softness and you will love how fashionable he/she looks.

A great gift for the baby in your life, you will be the hit of the shower when this gift is opened.

It is wrapped up with ribbon and tied with a coordinating handmade gift tag.

All items are machine washable.

Last thumbnail is one of the baby gift sets available in our shop!

We have something in every price range.
Custom orders are welcome.
~Thanks for looking ~
